Mentor-  Prof. S.B. Nair

Our main audience for the glove was hospitalized or disabled individuals. Our smart glove features gesture to speech conversion, home automation controls using gestures, medicine scheduler, obstacle detection and fall detection. This is mainly a hardware-based project and we have used various sensors, Raspberry Pi and Arduino for the project.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Mixed Reality solution for Disaster Management
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Developed an efficient mixed reality solution for post-disaster management. 
Features AR navigation, AR messages and real-time updates in Mixed Reality with voice commands to make basic tasks like communication, navigation and status monitoring easier for rescue team members.
